aircraft.value: Harrier Stealth - AC-8863-304 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Duct leakage at joint connection. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 18/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 19/01/2025 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 22/01/2025 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 23/01/2025 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 26/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
